Structs/StorageError.html#/s:7Storage0A5.name: identifier
Structs/StorageError.html#/s:7Storage0A5.abstract: A unique, machine readable, identifier for this error.

Structs/StorageError.html#/s:7Storage0A5.name: reason
Structs/StorageError.html#/s:7Storage0A5.abstract: A human readable message that describes the reason for the error.

Structs/LocalStorage.html#/s:7Storage05L.name: eventLoop
Structs/LocalStorage.html#/s:7Storage05L.abstract: The event loop group that the service lives on.

Structs/LocalStorage.html#/s:7Storage05L.name: defaultPath
Structs/LocalStorage.html#/s:7Storage05L.abstract: The default path to store files to if no path is passed in.

Structs/File.html#/s:7Storage4FileV8file.name: filename
Structs/File.html#/s:7Storage4FileV8file.abstract: The name of the file, including the extension.

Structs/File.html#/s:7Storage4FileV9exte.name: extension
Structs/File.html#/s:7Storage4FileV9exte.abstract: The file extension, if it has one.

Structs/File.html#/s:7Storage4FileV4data.name: data
Structs/File.html#/s:7Storage4FileV4data.abstract: The readable data contained in the buffer property.

Structs/LocalStorage.html.name: LocalStorage
Structs/LocalStorage.html.abstract: A Storage implementation that handles local file storage.

Structs/StorageError.html.name: StorageError
Structs/StorageError.html.abstract: The error type that is thrown when a storage operation fails.

Protocols/Storage.html#/s:7StorageAAP5st.name: store(file:at:)
Protocols/Storage.html#/s:7StorageAAP5st.abstract: Stores a new file at a given path.

Protocols/Storage.html#/s:7StorageAAP5fe.name: fetch(file:)
Protocols/Storage.html#/s:7StorageAAP5fe.abstract: Gets file data from a path or URL.

Protocols/Storage.html.name: Storage
Protocols/Storage.html.abstract: A type that can store and fetch resources using an underlying API, such as Google Cloud Storage or Foundation’s FileManager.
